prompts: Create a fighting-type Pokemon with a muscular build and dynamic pose.
I want a Pokemon that specializes in powerful kicks and acrobatic moves.
Generate an image of a humanoid Pokemon with long legs and a determined expression.
Make a Pokemon that embodies agility and strength with a unique fighting style.
Imagine a Pokemon that trains in various terrains to enhance its kicking abilities.
Design a Pokemon with a focus on martial arts, showcasing its combat stance.
Show me a bipedal Pokemon with a sleek body and impressive leg muscles.
